dp:metadata.dc:title: JR 09 - One Shot (2005)
dp:metadata.dc:creator: Lee Child
dp:metadata.dc:description: Six shots. Five dead. One heartland city thrown into a state of terror. But within hours the cops have it solved: a slam-dunk case. Except for one thing. The accused man says: You got the wrong guy. Then he says: Get Reacher for me. And sure enough, from the world he lives in--no phone, no address, no commitments-ex-military investigator Jack Reacher is coming.Â
